product_meta.title: Pillow Pets Poppy DreamWorks Trolls - Stuffed Plush Toy for Sleep, Play, Travel, and Comfort - Great for Boys and Girls of All Ages - Soft and Washable
product_meta.description: Welcome to Troll Town! Population: Crazy Happy. Introducing Poppy, voiced by Anna Kendrick in the DreamWorks animated children’s movie Trolls. We love her poptimistic attitude and pink up-do with signature flower headband. Poppy loves to hug as much as you do, so give her a squeeze with your new Pillow Pets Poppy stuffed plush toy. A sweet stuffed animal Troll by day, you can also style her Trolltastic hair. At night, Poppy becomes a comfy pillow for a restful night’s sleep. It’s a Pillow, it’s a Pet… It’s a Pillow Pet. A super-soft chenille plush folding stuffed animal so cuddly you’ll never want to put it down! An ideal naptime companion – not to mention a comforting partner on road trips or airplane rides – Pillow Pets are anything but just another toddler pillow. The Pillow Pet Poppy starts out as your pal, then un-fasten its belly, and it magically becomes your pillow! A bedtime solution that will have your kids running to their room with their new pet for a good night’s rest on their new favorite pillow. Made of high-quality washable chenille. BPA and phthalates free. Opens to a 16-inch pillow. As with all decorative pillows, not recommended for children under the age of 3.
